text:
hat to bring for labour and 
delivery (KMC wrap, woollen hat and booties)         
Link and arrange Ward Based Community Outreach 
Teams home visits         
    
Asked if fetal movements felt and normal 
Do if 1st 
visit was 
>20 weeks        
TB symptom screen         
Clinical examination for anaemia         
Urine tested for protein         
Uterus measured for growth - twins, IUGR

visit was 
>20 weeks
